sentence.text: He did n't know how to cope with someone who was nice to him all the time because all the other people that he knew best ( including his parents ) had always been unkind to him .
It 's hard to describe how nice everybody was to us at that school .
How nice he could be , she thought , as she saw his manner with the children warm , yet not in the least condescending with too much bonhomie .
She was quite nice to me , gave me a cup of tea , and said she knew about her father , that he was all right , and that I must n't worry .
His reputation as a really nice guy will be assured , amongst two club golfers at least , and he might even get into the pro-am prize money .
I did not know what to do or where to go , so I approached a very nice policeman , told him I was from the country and asked which gate I should use .
` And you have some very nice people in your congregation , " she added consolingly .
` He is a nice , intelligent guy but I think his public image reflects only what he wants known about himself .
He 's one of the nicest guys , I think , in showbusiness .
Maria had got herself a nice man with a brave , romantic job , a fellow who would n't go drinking and pinching all over the dock road .

It was nice of them to let me join in , they were very patient , but you could see they were itching for a good game and I 'm just hopeless .
But , when teachers were nice to me , I worked very hard . "
He 's a nice upright gent that people like , and all me gels is very fond of 'im , specially young Linda . "
Most people are nicer than you think they are on first acquaintance .
There was another pause before Barney said , ` It 's nice of you to call , Melissa , and thanks for believing in me . "
I just know it , even though you 're too nice to say it to my face . "
I 'm being nice about it .
He decided to be nice about the whole business , though he still could not see the point of it , and offered to put the little biscuity things into bowls .
I would even say something nice about his new-fangled haircut if he were to say something hopeful to the London borough of Newham .

Oh that 's nice of her .
Be nice to staff and volunteers , as much as possible !

I always try to be nice to the kids .
